name: DoodleToss-2010SouthAfrica
description:
########## FREE ###########
We like W CUP, do you want more goals in Doodle Toss?


##########DoodleToss###########
DoodleToss is a very Great and awesome game in APP store ever.

##What's NEW##
@ 2010 South Africa theme

##Features##
@ Original beautiful Doodle style
@ Tossing balls
@ 3 Different places
@ Global and local leaderboard with OpenFeint
@ Achievements

##How to play##
Toss the football into the W CUP
